mapper.select: select seat_address as seatAddress from field f,hall h where f.hall_id = h.UUID and f.UUID = #{fieldId}

select o.UUID as orderId, o.seats_name as seatsName, o.order_price as orderPrice, h.film_name as filmName, concat(DATE_FORMAT(o.order_time,%y年%m月%d日),' ',f.begin_time) as fieldTime, c.cinema_name as cinemaName, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(o.`order_time`) AS orderTimestamp from `order` o, field f, cinema c, hall_film_info h where o.cinema_id = c.UUID AND o.field = f.UUID AND o.film_id = h.film_id and o.UUID = #{orderId}

select o.UUID as orderId h.flim_name as filmName, concat(DATE_FORMAT(o.order_time,%y年%m月%d日),' ',f.begin_time) as fieldTime, c.`cinema_name` AS cinemaName, o.`seats_name` AS seatsName, o.`order_price` AS orderPrice, UNIX_TIMESTAMP(o.`order_time`) AS orderTimestamp from `order` o, field f, hall_film_info h, cinemal c where o.field_id = f.UUID, o.cinema_id = c.UUID, o.film_id = h.film_id o.order_user = #{userId}
